title: Reborn: A Band of Legends: Book One
description: Tyler Cole is dead, but more alive than ever. Surrounded by an entirely new world,he is thrown into a life that is more than he imagined. Joining up with a team of four supernatural people,he meets the Sister- a closed off Lycan who Tyler can't stop thinking of. Discovering that he is capable of so much more than the boring life he had when he was alive, Tyler is about to discover that there is life after death- but for how long?
author: J. McCreary
